AssociateVolume.name: AssociateVolume
AssociateVolume.documentation: Attaches a volume to a WorkSpace Instance.

CreateVolume.name: CreateVolume
CreateVolume.documentation: Creates a new volume for WorkSpace Instances.

CreateWorkspaceInstance.name: CreateWorkspaceInstance
CreateWorkspaceInstance.documentation: Launches a new WorkSpace Instance with specified configuration parameters, enabling programmatic workspace deployment.

DisassociateVolume.name: DisassociateVolume
DisassociateVolume.documentation: Detaches a volume from a WorkSpace Instance.

GetWorkspaceInstance.name: GetWorkspaceInstance
GetWorkspaceInstance.documentation: Retrieves detailed information about a specific WorkSpace Instance.

ListInstanceTypes.name: ListInstanceTypes
ListInstanceTypes.documentation: Retrieves a list of instance types supported by Amazon WorkSpaces Instances, enabling precise workspace infrastructure configuration.

ListRegions.name: ListRegions
ListRegions.documentation: Retrieves a list of AWS regions supported by Amazon WorkSpaces Instances, enabling region discovery for workspace deployments.

ListWorkspaceInstances.name: ListWorkspaceInstances
ListWorkspaceInstances.documentation: Retrieves a collection of WorkSpaces Instances based on specified filters.

AccessDeniedException.documentation: Indicates insufficient permissions to perform the requested action.

DeviceName.documentation: Name of the device for storage mapping.

BlockDeviceMappingRequest.documentation: Defines device mapping for WorkSpace Instance storage.

CapacityReservationResourceGroupArn.documentation: ARN of the capacity reservation resource group.

ConflictException.documentation: Signals a conflict with the current state of the resource.

ConnectionTrackingSpecificationRequest.documentation: Defines connection tracking parameters for network interfaces.

ClientToken.documentation: Unique token to prevent duplicate volume creation.

Encrypted.documentation: Indicates if the volume should be encrypted.

Iops.documentation: Input/output operations per second for the volume.

ClientToken.documentation: Unique token to ensure idempotent instance creation, preventing duplicate workspace launches.

Tags.documentation: Optional metadata tags for categorizing and managing WorkSpaces Instances.

ManagedInstance.documentation: Comprehensive configuration settings for the WorkSpaces Instance, including network, compute, and storage parameters.

CreateWorkspaceInstanceRequest.documentation: Defines the configuration parameters for creating a new WorkSpaces Instance.

WorkspaceInstanceId.documentation: Unique identifier assigned to the newly created WorkSpaces Instance.

CreateWorkspaceInstanceResponse.documentation: Returns the unique identifier for the newly created WorkSpaces Instance.

CreditSpecificationRequest.documentation: Defines CPU credit configuration for burstable instances.

WorkspaceInstanceId.documentation: Unique identifier of the WorkSpaces Instance targeted for deletion.

DeleteWorkspaceInstanceResponse.documentation: Confirms the successful deletion of the specified WorkSpace Instance.

EC2ErrorCode.documentation: Unique error code identifying the specific EC2 instance error.

EC2ExceptionType.documentation: Type of exception encountered during EC2 instance operation.

EC2ErrorMessage.documentation: Detailed description of the EC2 instance error.

EC2InstanceError.documentation: Captures detailed error information for EC2 instance operations.

InstanceId.documentation: Unique identifier of the managed EC2 instance.

EC2ManagedInstance.documentation: Represents an EC2 instance managed by WorkSpaces.

Iops.documentation: Input/output operations per second for the volume.

VolumeSize.documentation: Size of the EBS volume in gigabytes.

EbsBlockDevice.documentation: Defines configuration for an Elastic Block Store volume.

EnaSrdEnabled.documentation: Enables or disables ENA SRD for network performance.

EnaSrdSpecificationRequest.documentation: Defines Elastic Network Adapter (ENA) Scalable Reliable Datagram (SRD) configuration.

EnaSrdUdpEnabled.documentation: Enables or disables ENA SRD for UDP traffic.

Enabled.documentation: Enables or disables AWS Nitro Enclaves for enhanced security.

EnclaveOptionsRequest.documentation: Configures AWS Nitro Enclave options for the WorkSpace Instance.

WorkspaceInstanceId.documentation: Unique identifier of the WorkSpace Instance to retrieve.

GetWorkspaceInstanceRequest.documentation: Identifies the WorkSpaces Instance to retrieve detailed information for.

WorkspaceInstanceErrors.documentation: Captures any errors specific to the WorkSpace Instance lifecycle.

EC2InstanceErrors.documentation: Includes any underlying EC2 instance errors encountered.

ProvisionState.documentation: Current provisioning state of the WorkSpaces Instance.

WorkspaceInstanceId.documentation: Unique identifier of the retrieved WorkSpaces Instance.

EC2ManagedInstance.documentation: Details of the associated EC2 managed instance.

GetWorkspaceInstanceResponse.documentation: Provides comprehensive details about the requested WorkSpaces Instance.

HibernationOptionsRequest.documentation: Defines hibernation configuration for the WorkSpace Instance.

Arn.documentation: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM instance profile.

IamInstanceProfileSpecification.documentation: Defines IAM instance profile configuration for WorkSpace Instance.

Ipv6Address.documentation: Specific IPv6 address assigned to the instance.

IsPrimaryIpv6.documentation: Indicates if this is the primary IPv6 address for the instance.

InstanceIpv6Address.documentation: Represents an IPv6 address configuration for a WorkSpace Instance.

InstanceMaintenanceOptionsRequest.documentation: Configures automatic maintenance settings for WorkSpace Instance.

MarketType.documentation: Specifies the type of marketplace for instance deployment.

HttpEndpoint.documentation: Enables or disables HTTP endpoint for instance metadata.

HttpProtocolIpv6.documentation: Configures IPv6 support for instance metadata HTTP protocol.

HttpPutResponseHopLimit.documentation: Sets maximum number of network hops for metadata PUT responses.

HttpTokens.documentation: Configures token requirement for instance metadata retrieval.

InstanceMetadataTags.documentation: Enables or disables instance metadata tags retrieval.

EnaSrdSpecification.documentation: Configures Elastic Network Adapter Scalable Reliable Datagram settings.

NetworkCardIndex.documentation: Index of the network card for multiple network interfaces.

PrivateIpAddress.documentation: Primary private IP address for the interface.

PrivateIpAddresses.documentation: List of private IP addresses for the interface.

SecondaryPrivateIpAddressCount.documentation: Number of additional private IP addresses to assign.

Groups.documentation: Security groups associated with the network interface.

InstanceNetworkInterfaceSpecification.documentation: Defines network interface configuration for WorkSpace Instance.

BandwidthWeighting.documentation: Defines bandwidth allocation strategy for network interfaces.

InstanceNetworkPerformanceOptionsRequest.documentation: Configures network performance settings for WorkSpace Instance.

InstanceType.documentation: Unique identifier for the WorkSpace Instance type.

InstanceTypeInfo.documentation: Provides details about a specific WorkSpace Instance type.

RetryAfterSeconds.documentation: Recommended wait time before retrying the request.

Ipv4Prefix.documentation: Specific IPv4 prefix for network interface configuration.

Ipv4PrefixSpecificationRequest.documentation: Specifies IPv4 prefix configuration for network interfaces.

Ipv6Prefix.documentation: Specific IPv6 prefix for network interface configuration.

Ipv6PrefixSpecificationRequest.documentation: Specifies IPv6 prefix configuration for network interfaces.

LicenseConfigurationArn.documentation: ARN of the license configuration for the WorkSpace Instance.

MaxResults.documentation: Maximum number of instance types to return in a single API call. Enables pagination of instance type results.

NextToken.documentation: Pagination token for retrieving subsequent pages of instance type results.

ListInstanceTypesRequest.documentation: Defines input parameters for retrieving supported WorkSpaces Instances instance types.

InstanceTypes.documentation: Collection of supported instance types for WorkSpaces Instances.

NextToken.documentation: Token for retrieving additional instance types if the result set is paginated.

ListInstanceTypesResponse.documentation: Contains the list of instance types supported by WorkSpaces Instances.

MaxResults.documentation: Maximum number of regions to return in a single API call. Enables pagination of region results.

NextToken.documentation: Pagination token for retrieving subsequent pages of region results.

ListRegionsRequest.documentation: Defines input parameters for retrieving supported WorkSpaces Instances regions.

Regions.documentation: Collection of AWS regions supported by WorkSpaces Instances.

NextToken.documentation: Token for retrieving additional regions if the result set is paginated.

ListRegionsResponse.documentation: Contains the list of supported AWS regions for WorkSpaces Instances.

ListTagsForResourceRequest.documentation: Specifies the WorkSpace Instance to retrieve tags for.

Tags.documentation: Collection of tags associated with the WorkSpace Instance.

ListTagsForResourceResponse.documentation: Returns the list of tags for the specified WorkSpace Instance.

ProvisionStates.documentation: Filter WorkSpaces Instances by their current provisioning states.

MaxResults.documentation: Maximum number of WorkSpaces Instances to return in a single response.

NextToken.documentation: Pagination token for retrieving subsequent pages of WorkSpaces Instances.

ListWorkspaceInstancesRequest.documentation: Defines filters and pagination parameters for retrieving WorkSpaces Instances.

WorkspaceInstances.documentation: Collection of WorkSpaces Instances returned by the query.

NextToken.documentation: Token for retrieving additional WorkSpaces Instances if the result set is paginated.

ListWorkspaceInstancesResponse.documentation: Contains the list of WorkSpaces Instances matching the specified criteria.

CreditSpecification.documentation: Defines CPU credit configuration for burstable instances.

ImageId.documentation: Identifies the Amazon Machine Image (AMI) for the instance.

Ipv6AddressCount.documentation: Specifies number of IPv6 addresses to assign.

KeyName.documentation: Specifies the key pair for instance access.

UserData.documentation: Provides custom initialization data for the instance.

ManagedInstanceRequest.documentation: Defines comprehensive configuration for a managed WorkSpace Instance.

PartitionNumber.documentation: Specifies partition number for partition placement groups.

Placement.documentation: Defines instance placement configuration for WorkSpace Instance.

EnableResourceNameDnsARecord.documentation: Enables DNS A record for resource name resolution.

EnableResourceNameDnsAAAARecord.documentation: Enables DNS AAAA record for resource name resolution.

PrivateDnsNameOptionsRequest.documentation: Configures private DNS name settings for WorkSpace Instance.

Primary.documentation: Indicates if this is the primary private IP address.

PrivateIpAddress.documentation: Specific private IP address for the network interface.

PrivateIpAddressSpecification.documentation: Defines private IP address configuration for network interface.

Region.documentation: Represents an AWS region supported by WorkSpaces Instances.

ResourceId.documentation: Identifier of the resource that was not found.

ResourceType.documentation: Type of the resource that was not found.

ResourceNotFoundException.documentation: Indicates the requested resource could not be found.

ResourceId.documentation: Identifier of the resource related to the quota.

ResourceType.documentation: Type of resource related to the quota.

ServiceCode.documentation: Code identifying the service with the quota limitation.

ServiceQuotaExceededException.documentation: Indicates that a service quota has been exceeded.

InstanceInterruptionBehavior.documentation: Specifies behavior when spot instance is interrupted.

SpotInstanceType.documentation: Defines the type of spot instance request.

ValidUntilUtc.documentation: Timestamp until which spot instance request is valid.

WorkspaceInstanceId.documentation: Unique identifier of the WorkSpace Instance to tag.

Tags.documentation: Tags to be added to the WorkSpace Instance.

TagResourceRequest.documentation: Specifies tags to add to a WorkSpace Instance.

Tags.documentation: Collection of tags for the specified resource.

RetryAfterSeconds.documentation: Recommended wait time before retrying the request.

ThrottlingException.documentation: Indicates the request rate has exceeded limits.

WorkspaceInstanceId.documentation: Unique identifier of the WorkSpace Instance to untag.

UntagResourceRequest.documentation: Specifies tags to remove from a WorkSpace Instance.

ValidationException.documentation: Indicates invalid input parameters in the request.

Name.documentation: Name of the field that failed validation.

Message.documentation: Detailed error message describing the validation issue.

ValidationExceptionField.documentation: Represents a validation error field in an API request.

ProvisionState.documentation: Current provisioning state of the WorkSpace Instance.

EC2ManagedInstance.documentation: Details of the associated EC2 managed instance.

ErrorCode.documentation: Unique error code for the WorkSpace Instance error.

ErrorMessage.documentation: Detailed description of the WorkSpace Instance error.

WorkspaceInstanceError.documentation: Captures errors specific to WorkSpace Instance operations.

documentation: Amazon WorkSpaces Instances provides an API framework for managing virtual workspace environments across multiple AWS regions, enabling programmatic creation and configuration of desktop infrastructure.
